rules.description: CAPS LOCK + qwertzuiopü+ --> signs from number row + shift

from.comment: fn+o cannot be re-mapped on Keyboard K6 :(

rules.description: CAPS LOCK: asdf gh jklö --> numeric
NOT WORKING: Left CTRL tapped --> left cursor

manipulators.description: 1 plus left shift plus left ctrl --> launch Chrome
2 plus left shift plus left ctrl --> launch Google Chats
3 plus left shift plus left ctrl --> launch Telegram
4 plus left shift plus left ctrl --> launch Libre Office
Home plus left shift plus left ctrl --> launch Spotify
PageDown plus left shift plus left ctrl --> launch Terminal
PageUp plus left shift plus left ctrl --> launch VSC

rules.description: capslock plus tab toggles layer2 --> on
capslock plus tab toggles Layer2 --> off

manipulators.description: Layer2: } as printed on key BROKEN
Layer2: y as printed on key
Layer2: z as printed on key

profiles.name: XSilent Keychrone K6 and Macbook Pro internal keyboard
